briefTitle: Follow-up to Welcome Study C87042 [NCT00308581] Examining Certolizumab Pegol (CDP870) in Subjects With Crohn's Disease
officialTitle: Open Label Long Term Clinical Trial Evaluating Efficacy and Safety of Chronic Therapy With Certolizumab Pegol, a PEGylated Fab Fragment of Humanized Antibody to Tumor Necrosis Factor Alpha (TNF) in Patients Suffering From Crohn's Disease and Having Completed C87042 Study.
summary: The study will continue to assess the safety of certolizumab pegol (CDP870) as well as examine the evolution of long term efficacy in Crohn's disease patients who completed study C87042 \[NCT00308581\]. It will also assess the effect of subcutaneous CDP870 400 mg on direct cost parameters.

primaryOutcome.measure: Occurrence of at Least One Study-emergent Adverse Event During the Study (Maximum 164 Weeks)
